siteMetadata.name: Max Voelker
siteMetadata.title: Max Voelker | Data Science Manager
siteMetadata.description: Data Science Manager leading ML/AI initiatives for Fraud Prevention in Amazon Web Services with 10+ years of experience in ML/AI and risk management.
siteMetadata.about: I'm a data science leader focused on scaling ML/AI systems at enterprise level. Over the past decade, I've moved from individual contributor to strategic executive, building high-performing data science teams. I focus on technical excellence, talent development, and delivering measurable business outcomes through ML solutions.
siteMetadata.author: Max Voelker
